amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to relocate the Office of the Census or employees from the Department of Commerce to the jurisdiction of the Executive Office of the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 262 - 162 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Burton (IN) amendment (A017).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A017) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 251 - 168 (Roll no. 383).
